title: An Unparalleled Master of Martial Arts - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Shounen   Xuanhuan
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Male Protagonist   Polygamy   Transmigration   Weak to Strong
author: Cat Bathing In The Sun   晒太阳的猫
description:
Trash mocked by all? A pathetic despised by all?

He, Lu Yun, a humble soul transmigrated to the land of the Sacred Wilderness, is now a different man! This accident he endures brings him a new opportunity, a new life, and a chance to rise to be an unparalleled master of martial arts.

Lu Yun: “I am unparalleled because of my invincible power!”

Join Lu Yun in his journey to the pinnacle of martial arts, and explore all the legendary weapons and ferocious monsters as well as the power struggles among sects.>
